column5: Anyone have feedback on the current 502 road conditions. Any construction going on ? Thanks JohnnyV
Skywagon, thanks for the update! We will be hitting the 502, this Sat!
Don't bring that hot weather with you Wallydave.

Skywagon, the forecast for cen. Il the day we leave is in the low 90's! One of the great things about the trip North is the cooler weather! The forecast for next week looks pretty good, 60-70s Less than 23 hours before we leave! I'm trusting the border guards won't let us bring the hot weather North!
